email_subject: Great deals on perfect Summer cameras! (CNET SHOPPER)
email_body: The body of the email is in HTML format and contains promotional content for various cameras and offers from Computers4Sure and buy.com. It includes images, links to products, and special deals such as 'Fujifilm FinePix 30i just $245!' and 'Great deals and free shipping!' from buy.com. The email also contains standard newsletter elements like headers, footers, and unsubscribe links.
